Milt,

The ones in the Koza do not have rope mimi, though the
writeup does mention they are often seen with iron
rope mimi.

Your killing me in that I own another one of those
books you mentioned, but had not looked into it
either. Thank you again for all the help.
    Realizing they are in some of my books... it is
like looking everywhere for my glasses, only to have
you tell me they've been on top of my head for the
last hour...

I'm now very certain the tsuba is Tochibata. I remain
curious if the NTHK/NBTHK still paper to Tochibata- of
if they just paper them to "Owari" nowadays.
   Anyone have NTHK/NBTHK papers to Tochibata ?

Curran
